original_text: Jesus and his disciples were going towards Jerusalem. As they walked along, Jesus took his 12 disciples away from the other people where he could speak to them alone.
korean_text: 예수께서 예루살렘으로 올라가려 하실 때에 열두 제자를 따로 데리시고 길에서 이르시되

sentences.original_text: Jesus and his disciples were going towards Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님과 그의 제자들이 예루살렘으로 가고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: Jesus took his 12 disciples away from the other people
where he could speak to them alone
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 그는 그들과 혼자 말할 수 있었습니다
